summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of CustodyKeeper application. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing covered all major pages, dialogs, and features. Dark mode toggle works correctly. Mobile responsiveness verified.

issues: The 'Add violation' button data-testid is missing - button text shows 'Log Violation' instead

action_items: Consider adding data-testid='add-violation-btn' to the Log Violation button in ViolationsPage.jsx for test consistency

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All pages load, dialogs work, mobile responsive)

seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up TEST_Journal_Entry for UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major features tested successfully. Backend APIs: Auth, Calendar CRUD, Journal CRUD, Violations CRUD, Contacts CRUD, Children, Documents, Share tokens, Dashboard stats all working. Frontend: All pages load correctly, dialogs have proper dark text on white background, dark mode works, mobile responsiveness verified on 390x844 viewport. Navigation menu works on mobile. Event cards on dashboard are clickable and show view-only dialog.

pages_tested.landing_page: PASS - Hero section, navbar, feature sections all visible
pages_tested.login_page: PASS - Form works, password toggle works
pages_tested.dashboard: PASS - Stats cards (6/6), upcoming events, event click opens dialog
pages_tested.journal: PASS - CRUD works, export/PDF/print buttons visible, search works
pages_tested.violations: PASS - Page loads, severity cards visible, export buttons work
pages_tested.calendar: PASS - Monthly view, events display, add/edit dialogs work, PDF export
pages_tested.documents: PASS - Upload dialog works, category filter, search
pages_tested.contacts: PASS - CRUD works, photo upload in dialog
pages_tested.timeline: PASS - Filters work, sort toggle, displays all record types
pages_tested.settings: PASS - Profile section, children section, add child dialog with color picker
pages_tested.sharing: PASS - Create share link dialog, toggle switches for content types
pages_tested.support_advocacy: PASS - 10 resource cards with social links (TikTok, Facebook, Website)

dialog_text_visibility: All dialogs verified to have dark text (#1A202C) on white background - PASS
dark_mode: PASS - Toggle works, theme applies across all pages
mobile_responsive: PASS - Tested on 390x844 viewport, hamburger menu works, all pages adapt correctly
